Moneyfied - Mutual Expense Manager
Helps you to keep a record of expenses made by you and your friend for each other. The app also gives a final statement about who has to pay whom and how much.


Highlights-

*Splitting bill equally

*Notification on each transaction made

*Easy log in via phone number

*Setting name and profile picture

*Names of the connections are shown as names you save in contact

*Record of each transactions made

*Offline capability
